name: Crowyal Game of Ur
description:
The crow needs to deliver a message to the Master of Death. There is one problem though, it doesn’t have the coin to traverse the river that connects the living plane with the world of the dead. But the ferryman offers a deal: if the crow wins in his game, it is free to go. If it loses it must work for the ferryman, who knows for how long.

The Crowyal Game of Ur is an adaption of the Royal Game of Ur, an ancient mesopotamian board game, themed with pixel art aesthetics and some mythology.
